original: Hallberg, Rolf I var, här ads skri vare, Uddevalla, f. 12/4/06 i Häl’singb. av postmast. Ivar H. o. Elin Söderström. G. 38 m. Anna-Lisia Karlsson. Barn: Monica f. 42, Sten 45. — Landsfiskals-ex. 34. Ans t. v. iän s-styr. i Gbgs o. Boh. 1. 32-46, häradsskriv. i Uddevalla fr. 46. V. ordf. i Gbgs norra bef :u’tb :-fören. 43-46, led. av styr. f. Gbgs be-f:utb:förb. 44-46. Hohby: landstormis-rör. Gbgs norra bef :utb:fören. GM, Gbgs bef :utb:förb. SM.
translated: Hallberg, Rolf; In civilian life clerk; born in Uddevalla on April 12, 1906, in Hälsingborg. Son of postmaster Ivar H. and Elin Söderström. Married in 1938 to Anna-Lisia Karlsson. Children: Monica born in 1942, Sten born in 1945. Passed the County Fiscal Exam in 1934. Employed at the age supervisory board in Gothenburg and Bohus from 1932 to 1946, and district clerk in Uddevalla from 1946. Vice-chairman of the Gothenburg Northern Citizens' Association from 1943 to 1946, and member of the board for the Gothenburg Citizens' Public Transport Association from 1944 to 1946. Hobby: Home Guard Movement of the Gothenburg Northern Citizens' Association. Awarded: Military Medal, Gothenburg Citizens' Public Transport Association Medal.

memberOfHobby.name: Home Guard Movement of the Gothenburg Northern Citizens' Association

awards.name: Gothenburg Citizens' Public Transport Association Medal
